Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 30 for SLE 12 SP2)

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 30 for SLE 12 SP2)
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the Linux Kernel 4.4.121-92_114 fixes several issues.

The following security issues were fixed:

- CVE-2019-10220: Fixed a relative path escape in the Samba client module (bsc#1144903, bsc#1153108).
- CVE-2019-17133: Fixed a buffer overflow in cfg80211_mgd_wext_giwessid in net/wireless/wext-sme.c caused by long SSID IEs (bsc#1153158).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: In the Linux kernel through 5.3.2, cfg80211_mgd_wext_giwessid in net/wireless/wext-sme.c does not reject a long SSID IE, leading to a Buffer Overflow.
